## Description {#details}

This file implements the construction of a VPlan-based Hierarchical CFG (H-CFG) for an incoming IR.

This construction comprises the following components and steps:

<SectionDefinition>

## Defines

### DEBUG&#95;TYPE {#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&quot;loop-vectorize&quot;</>}>

<ul>
<li><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-vplanhcfgbuilder-cpp-/plaincfgbuilder">PlainCFGBuilder</a> class: builds a plain VPBasicBlock-based CFG that faithfully represents the CFG in the incoming IR. A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a> (Top <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>) is created to enclose and serve as parent of all the VPBasicBlocks in the plain CFG. NOTE: At this point, there is a direct correspondence between all the VPBasicBlocks created for the initial plain CFG and the incoming BasicBlocks. However, this might change in the future.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00028">28</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanhcfgbuilder-cpp">VPlanHCFGBuilder.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Scan the body of the loop in a topological order to visit each basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block after having visited its predecessor basic blocks. Create a VPBB for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// each BB and link it to its successor and predecessor VPBBs. Note that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predecessors must be set in the same order as they are in the incomming IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, there might be problems with existing phi nodes and algorithm</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representing the condition bit in VPlan (which may be in another VPBB).</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Missing condition bit in IRDef2VPValue!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;IRSucc0 = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;IRSucc1 = BI-&gt;getSuccessor(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> &#42;Successor0 = getOrCreateVPBB(IRSucc0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> &#42;Successor1 = getOrCreateVPBB(IRSucc1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB == LoopForBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a1230fd674d2609b96527fe65eaf40b1b">getLoopLatch</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a latch we need to set the successor of the region rather than that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of VPBB and it should be set to the exit, i.e., non-header successor,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// except for the top region, whose successor was set when creating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VPlan&#39;s skeleton.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TheRegion != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Latch of the top region should have been handled earlier&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>-&gt;setOneSuccessor(<a href="#a85f42ae734efbd570ae873ab9aa8edc0">isHeaderVPBB</a>(Successor0) ? Successor1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       : Successor0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>-&gt;setExiting(VPBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t connect any blocks outside the current loop except the latch for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// now. The latch is handled above.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LoopForBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
